    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction​(char type,
                   double amount,
                   double balance,
                   java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new Transaction given the type of the transaction, the amount, the new balance after this transaction, and the description.
        • If the description is not specified, it will default to N/A.
        Parameters:
        type - type of the transaction (D = Deposit or W = Withdrawal)
        amount - amount
        balance - new balance after this transaction
        description - description
